programme.title: US immigrants and identity
programme.short_synopsis: The adoption of "old world" identities by new immigrants to New York City.
programme.medium_synopsis: The replacement of American unity with old world identities in immigrant communities old and new and the decision to re-route New York's jets for the sake of a tennis match.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
